description: I. BIS press release: review established to examine delivery of financial support for students. 14 Oct 2009. 2 p. II. Terms of reference for a review of delivery by the Student Loans Company of financial support to students studying in England for academic year 2009/10 and plans for academic year 20010/11. 2 p. III. Letter dated 12/11/2009 from David Lammy MP and John Goodfellow (Chairman, Student Loans Company) to Prof. Deian Hopkin regarding the terms of reference for a review of delivery by the Student Loans Company of financial support to students studying in England from 2009/10 to 20010/11. 1 p.
department: Dept for Business, Innovation and Skills
